com.facebook.buck.support.bgtasks

Interface BackgroundTaskManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncBackgroundTaskManager

    public interface BackgroundTaskManager
    BackgroundTaskManager schedules and runs background bgtasks like cleanup/logging. A manager should be notified when a new command starts and when it finishes so that it can schedule bgtasks appropriately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  BackgroundTaskManager.Notification
      Code passed to notify().

      Schedule a list of tasks to be run in the background.
      void shutdown(long timeout, TimeUnit units)
      Shut down manager, waiting until given timeout for tasks to finish.
      void shutdownNow()
      Shut down manager, without waiting for tasks to finish.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        void schedule(BackgroundTask<?> task)
        Schedule a task to be run in the background.
        Parameters:
        task - BackgroundTask object to be run

      • schedule

        void schedule(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<? extends BackgroundTask<?>> taskList)
        Schedule a list of tasks to be run in the background.
        Parameters:
        taskList - List of BackgroundTask objects

      • notify

        void notify(BackgroundTaskManager.Notification code)
        Notify the manager of some event, e.g. command start/end. Exceptions should generally be caught and handled by the manager, except in test implementations.
        Parameters:
        code - Type of event to notify of

      • shutdownNow

        void shutdownNow()
        Shut down manager, without waiting for tasks to finish.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(long timeout,
              TimeUnit units)
       throws InterruptedException
        Shut down manager, waiting until given timeout for tasks to finish.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout for tasks to finish
        units - units of timeout
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
